description: This file defines a custom exception class 'ProductNotFoundException' used to signal that a product with a specific ID was not found. It extends RuntimeException and constructs an error message including the product ID.

classes.name: ProductNotFoundException
classes.description: A runtime exception indicating that a product with a specific ID was not found.

methods.name: ProductNotFoundException(Long id)
methods.description: Constructor that creates the exception with a message indicating the missing product ID.
